subject: Football (College)
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
Bowl Games
College Football Playoff National Championship
Orange Bowl (Football Game)
Cotton Bowl (Football Game)
Television
New Year
lead_paragraph: After the College Football Playoff rejected an ESPN proposal to move the semifinals from New Year’s Eve, the ratings tumbled. Still, the head of the Playoff sees no reason to change the scheduling.
snippet: After the College Football Playoff rejected an ESPN proposal to move the semifinals from New Year’s Eve, the ratings tumbled. Still, the head of the Playoff sees no reason to change the scheduling.
